description:
Video from NHK Anime Pavilion 2008 event that was held at NHK Minna no Hiroba Fureai Hall on 14 August 2008.
Director Ishiguro Noboru and character design supervisor Mikimoto Haruhiko are questioned by Hoshi Makoto to tell their side of the story.

titles.title: "NHK Anime Pavilion 2008" Talk Show - Part 1 of 2: Behind-the-scenes Stories About Tytania`s Production Process
"NHK Anime-kan 2008" Talk Show (Zenpen: Tytania Seisaku Hiwa)
「NHKアニメ館2008」トークショー (前編・タイタニア制作秘話)
